data.meta_site_name: Department of Slavic, East European & Eurasian Languages & Cultures - UCLA
data.text:
Russian

Добро пожаловать!

The Russian Program at UCLA offers beginning, intermediate, and advanced Russian courses, as well as a program for students who speak Russian at home. We also host one of the eight Russian Flagship Centers in the United States. Our students take part in a wide array of educational and entertaining activities, including presentations at an Annual Undergraduate Research Conference and publication in an online Research Journal, readings at Russian poetry nights, making films in Russian, singing Russian songs, learning Russian folk dances, and playing Russian folk instruments.
